title: Trump Cries "Witch Hunt" over Michael Cohen's Raid | Mariska Hargitay
itunes:title: Trump Cries "Witch Hunt" over Michael Cohen's Raid | Mariska Hargitay
description:
President Trump goes on an angry rant about the FBI's raid of his personal lawyer's office, and Mariska Hargitay discusses her HBO documentary "I Am Evidence."
